climbs.name: Dogtooth
climbs.fa: FA - Phil and Cabe Reynolds, May 2018

content.description: Climb straight up crag staying on smooth vertical faces near center of formation.  Crimpers and friction moves take line to the top.
content.location: Start anywhere near center of crag.  Walk off to the west.

climbs.name: Blood Soaked Hero
climbs.fa: FA - Phil and Cabe Reynolds, May 2018

content.description: Same as other routes on formation.  Use any variety of trad techniques to climb steps and cracks to the top.  Clean rock easy lead.
content.location: Right hand side of formation staying out of rubble and talus to the east.  Walk off to west.

climbs.name: [Redacted]
climbs.fa: FA - Phil and Cabe Reynolds, May 2018

content.description: Climb smooth orange rock using cracks, friction, or mantle, with ample pro, all the way to the top.  Easy trad lead.
content.protection: Small trad rack with gear to 1".
content.location: Start on extreme left of large crag from flat grassy area, taking line through steps and blocks at bottom.  Move onto glassy face near top.  Walk off to the west.
